featuredArticle.title: 2026 Presidential Campaign Officially Kicks Off with First Major Debates
featuredArticle.excerpt: The 2026 presidential race has officially begun with the first round of primary debates. Candidates from both parties outlined their visions for healthcare, the economy, and foreign policy, setting the stage for what analysts predict will be a historic election.
